casebody.data:
BELL
v.
GOODYEAR TIRE AND RUBBER COMPANY, et al. 135P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 26, 2017 Matthew J. Ledwith, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, M. Duane Jones, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Goodyear Tire And Rubber Company, et al. Kathleen G. Sumner, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Bell, Celia A.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of April 2017 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of April 2017."
